description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may search for private key certificate files on compromised systems for insecurely stored credentials. Analytic 1 - Commands indicating searches for private keys. (index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4688 CommandLine="*private key*" OR CommandLine="*certificate*" OR CommandLine IN ("*.key*", "*.pgp*", "*.gpg*", "*.ppk*", "*.p12*", "*.pem*", "*.pfx*", "*.cer*", "*.p7b*", "*.asc*")) OR (index=sysmon sourcetype="WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode=1 CommandLine="*private key*" OR CommandLine="*certificate*" OR CommandLine IN ("*.key*", "*.pgp*", "*.gpg*", "*.ppk*", "*.p12*", "*.pem*", "*.pfx*", "*.cer*", "*.p7b*", "*.asc*")) OR (index=os sourcetype="linux_secure" action="execve" CommandLine="*private key*" OR CommandLine="*certificate*" OR CommandLine IN ("*.key*", "*.pgp*", "*.gpg*", "*.ppk*", "*.p12*", "*.pem*", "*.pfx*", "*.cer*", "*.p7b*", "*.asc*")) OR (index=os sourcetype="macos_secure" event_type="execve" CommandLine="*private key*" OR CommandLine="*certificate*" OR CommandLine IN ("*.key*", "*.pgp*", "*.gpg*", "*.ppk*", "*.p12*", "*.pem*", "*.pfx*", "*.cer*", "*.p7b*", "*.asc*"))
